parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of bodies of a multibody part in the drawing view

title: IView.IGetBodies
description: Gets the bodies of a multibody part in the drawing view.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of bodies of a multibody part in the drawing view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of bodies VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetBodiesCount
to get the value of Count.
